programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: In the year 1971, San Francisco faces the terror of a maniac known as Scorpio- who snipes at innocent victims and demands ransom through notes left at the scene of the crime. Inspector Harry Callahan (known as Dirty Harry by his peers through his reputation handling of homicidal cases) is assigned to the case along with his newest partner Inspector Chico Gonzalez to track down Scorpio and stop him. Using humiliation and cat and mouse type of games against Callahan, Scorpio is put to the test with the cop with a dirty attitude.

programme.title: Full House S1 19

programme.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Stone Age Earth: In the presence of a mysterious black obelisk, pre-humans discover the use of tools--and weapons--violently taking first steps toward intelligence. 1999: On Earth's moon astronauts uncover another mysterious black obelisk. 2001: Between Earth and Jupiter, the spacecraft's intelligent computer makes a mistake that kills most of the human crew--then continues to kill to hide its error. Beyond Time: The sole survivor of the journey to Jupiter ascends to the next level of humanity.

programme.title: Training Day

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend Of The Sword
programme.desc: Acclaimed filmmaker Guy Ritchie brings his dynamic style to the epic fantasy action adventure "King Arthur: Legend of the Sword." Starring Charlie Hunnam in the title role, the film is an iconoclastic take on the classic Excalibur myth, tracing Arthur's journey from the streets to the throne. When the child Arthur's father is murdered, Vortigern (Jude Law), Arthur's uncle, seizes the crown. Robbed of his birthright and with no idea who he truly is, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, his life is turned upside down and he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy...whether he likes it or not.

programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders - Episode 36
programme.desc: Start your Sunday morning with the show the politicians rely on to find out what's going on. David Speers presents Australia's must-watch political program, joined by a panel of the best political analysts and commentators.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 35
programme.desc: Host Abbey Gelmi and a panel of leading sportswriters, commentators and athletes examine the big issues and major results in sport. Offsiders unpacks all the action, both on and off the field.

programme.title: L.A. Confidential
programme.desc: Amidst corruption, murder and the glamour of famous movie stars, three police officer fight to uncover the truth of a brutal mass murder.

programme.title: Conan The Destroyer
programme.desc: Conan is asked by the evil Queen Taramis to accompany a beautiful young princess in finding a magic treasure. If he returns with the treasure and the princess, the Queen promises to bring Conan's beloved Valeria back from the dead. But little does he know that she plans to kill both him and the princess, and that the return of the treasure will mean the extinction of mankind.

programme.title: Epic Movie

programme.title: Open the Coffin
programme.desc: Ghost Hand and his tomb raiders resurface in Jiang City to seek gold in ancient tombs after a 3-year absence. They released an evil spirit from a coffin and all four died at home eventually. Poison and pinholes in the corpses become the sole clue for police investigation. A tomb raid now unfolds as a perplexing and mysterious case.

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Open the Coffin
programme.desc: Ghost Hand and his tomb raiders resurface in Jiang City to seek gold in ancient tombs after a 3-year absence. They released an evil spirit from a coffin and all four died at home eventually. Poison and pinholes in the corpses become the sole clue for police investigation. A tomb raid now unfolds as a perplexing and mysterious case.

When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple starts to experience some terrifying incidents, including the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Deep in the Sea

He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: The Pickup Truck Killer
programme.desc: Chamlong 'Nirut' Sornkamharn worked the highways of Thailand, hiring men as truck drivers, poisoning them to death and stealing their cars. Was he working for car traffickers or a serial killer?

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Those closest to Madison Nygard share the agonising details around the beautiful 16-year-old's terrifying abduction as she walked home from a party.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A fight at a marijuana dispensary ends with a stabbing, and a couple faces life-changing charges. A 22-year-old rapper is delighted by his mugshot but not by spending his birthday in jail.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When Susan Woods, 30, is found beaten and drowned in her tub in America's Cowboy Capitol, suspicion falls on her estranged husband.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: On 24th September 2019, 20-year-old Tashan Daniel is on his way to watch his beloved Arsenal FC play Nottingham Forest, but a brutal attack at the train station ends the talented athlete's hopes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: When a Christian ranch hand, Dan Lavigne, 52, is shot dead on his porch in Montana, 2002, deputies find no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: Undercover ATF and DEA agents are reminded to never judge a book by its cover and to always be on their toes. Even small-time suspects have the potential to unleash terror.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: A historic Texan town is stunned when a popular caretaker is found dead and a beloved resident goes missing. But with support from a concerned community, detectives uncover the secrets that led to murder.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: Police quickly identify a suspect in the murder of a local college professor, but a bombshell piece of technology stolen from the crime scene then points them in a completely different direction.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When reliable 22-year-old, Molly Jane Matheson, didn't show up for work, her mother Tracy drove to her Fort Worth, Texas apartment to check on her.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: In 2009, Emilia Carr and her boyfriend Joshua Fulgham were convicted for the first-degree murder and kidnapping of Heather Strong, and Emilia alone was sentenced to death.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Critical Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: A man is gunned down in broad daylight and detectives learn it could be connected to another homicide. A teenage girl is lured to her death by someone she considered a friend.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A man arrested at sea tries to swim away from police; a man wearing a blue bonnet steals baby formula; a mom goes to extreme measures with a housemate and is arrested for assault.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A former mayor opens fire on a S.W.A.T. team; a grieving mother berates her child's killer; a convicted murderer has a surprise for the court; and more.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: In Mobile, a 70-year-old Vietnam vet is found beaten to death in his home where detectives discover threatening letters. In New Orleans, Detective Amy Robinson works the case of a man shot behind a store.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6)
programme.desc: After a construction company boss is found shot dead, no arrests are made. An employee says he'd been bound and gagged by a gang just before the shooting. But 14 years later police charge him with murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: In June 1985, a 20-year-old 'Sucker Day' Festival Queen is found brutalised. The small community of Nixa, Missouri, is certain her blood is in the hands of a local wealthy businessman.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: Detectives in Tulsa have only one witness to a domestic dispute that's escalated to a double homicide — a 12-year-old girl. Their case hangs on this question: will she or won't she be able to testify?

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: In Gwinnett County, two brothers are murdered in their sleep. Detectives suspect they were betrayed by someone they knew.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe, Jinx, and Booch are designing a new school mascot, but Max and Phoebe's fighting ruins the project. After Chloe expresses her anger toward her siblings, they realize their twin-fighting impacts Chloe in new ways now that they're guardians.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: After Schwoz's experiment-gone-wrong causes an infestation at Sw.A.G, Danger Force enrolls at Swellview Junior High and stumbles into an extra-curricular crime wave.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Captain Man loses his powers of invulnerability, he becomes too afraid to fight crime. It is up to Kid Danger to keep Swellview safe and figure out how to restore Captain Man's powers.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
